title: Cryptotims
author: Cryptotims
content: Good day, dear users of the service!We are glad to present you our cryptotims.com cryptocurrency exchange service - fast and reliable.About Us:- No hidden fees- Secure https protocol- Registration in two clicks, user-friendly interface- The most popular cryptocurrency destinations- Our service continues to improve and add new exchange directions.- Technical support. Always in touch.ATTENTION! All exchanges take place strictly through the application on the site, we do not make exchanges in messengers. Beware of scammers.Service hours: from Monday to Saturday, from 10:00 to 21:00 Moscow time. Sun-free schedule.You can evaluate all our advantages and share your impressions in the comments on this forum after any exchange operation.Contacts:You can contact us during business hours via online chat or via Telegram at cryptotims.com.Sincerely,Administration cryptotims.com.

comments.author: Cryptotims
comments.body: Good day. Dear users of the service!            Hooray!+ New Directions!Added new directions of exchange with currencies:Tether TRC20 (USDT) -> Monero (XMR)Tether ERC20 (USDT) -> Monero (XMR)Monero (XMR) -> Tether TRC20 (USDT)Monero (XMR) -> Tether ERC20 (USDT)Happy trading!Best regards Cryptotims.com

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Please do not violate the forum rules. You are in the English section of the forum, and it is customary to write in English here. Therefore, please rewrite your post in English. Otherwise your post will be deleted. Thank you for your understanding.
